event.title: Keynote "Why we talk about Free Software" at first Free Software conference, Albania

body.p: On May, 3rd, Erik Albers will give a keynote about "Why we talk about Free Software" at OSCAL, the first Free Software conference in Tirana, Albania. Entrance is for no cost but seats are limited and the registration is closed. The conference is organised by OpenLabs, Tirana.
